mapper.delete: delete from oj where username = #{username} and platform = #{platform}
mapper.select: select a.platform,a.oj_id,a.username,a.history_rating,a.now_rating from oj a where platform = #{platform} and not EXISTS( select 1 from oj where username = a.username and now_rating > a.now_rating and platform = #{platform} ) order by now_rating desc
